title: FS: T206 Irv Young, name on top (Sold)
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Irv Young, name on top (Sold)
posts.post_content:
I bought this to have an example of a name-on-top card in my T206 set. Then I was able to buy an example of a Hall of Famer with the name on top, so this has become expendable. Scan pretty much tells the story, but if you have questions, feel free to email me at: wolfie51sb at aol.com

These scans were done at 200 dpi, so obviously every crease/defect is going to look very pronounced.

Thanks, Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com
